longBusinessSummary: Granules India Limited manufactures and sells active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs), pharmaceutical formulation intermediates, and finished dosages (FDs) in India and internationlly. The company's APIs in various therapeutic categories include anti-retrovirals, anti-hypertensives, anti-histamines, anti-infectives, analgesics, anti-coagulants, anti-fibriotics, and platelet inhibitors. It also offers tablets, caplets, and press-fit capsules in bulk, blister packs, and bottles; high potent products; and other products for oncology. Granules India Limited was founded in 1984 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
